channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Audition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Audition

item.title: CVE-2020-9618|2024-08-04T10:34:39.694Z -- adobe -- adobe%20audition
item.description: Adobe Audition versions 13.0.5 and earlier have an out-of-bounds read vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-9658|2024-08-04T10:34:39.941Z -- adobe -- adobe%20audition
item.description: Adobe Audition versions 13.0.6 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .

item.title: CVE-2020-9659|2024-08-04T10:34:39.870Z -- adobe -- adobe%20audition
item.description: Adobe Audition versions 13.0.6 and earlier have an out-of-bounds write vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution .
